pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Sproutling, 1 Bark Enforced Sproutling, 2 Iron Ingot, 1 Empty Upgrade Packet, 150 Sun value.

pages.title: Brusier
pages.text: $(#25228d)Super Chompers inhales nearby zombies before chewing it all down.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Tall. When a Zombie gets close, sucks and swallows any Zombie in range. Chews after sucking for 2s.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Super Chomper wins any eating contest he enters. Only one problem: It's because he ends up eating the competition too. He sucks.
